s1: The dog knocked over the plant.

s4: I took my dog to the park.

s1: The green juice spilled all over the computer.

s1: I left my jacket in the kitchen this morning.

s4: I dropped my keys in a water well.

s6: My poetry is an outlet for my emotions.

s1: The train conductor's orange vest had a stain.

s4: I enjoyed eating my orange.

s1: Bell peppers grow well in wet environments.

s1: I like to study on my chair.

s4: There is no life without liberty.

s1: I could see the smoke outside through the glass windows.
